text: Tabe ki ye rayeche tara prabhura kache theke spasta-pramanera upare pratisthita ebam tamra kacha theke ekajana saksi ta patha karena, ara era age musara grantha pathanirdesaka o karunasbarupa? Era ete bisbasa kare. Ara dalagulora madhyera ye ete abisbasa posana kare tara pratiâ€Œsruta sthana tabe aguna, ata'eba tumi e-sanbandhe sandehe theko na. Nihsandeha eti tomara prabhura kacha the ke dhrubasatya, kintu besirabhaga loke'i bisbasa kare na.
